overview: Story of Hagoromo, or feather robe from heaven, is a legend of Miho Beach.  An angel sets her foot on the beach to bathe in the sea.  Watching her, a fisherman sneaks her robe out, but returns it due to feeling guilty.  That makes the angel very happy and she flies up to.  .  .  heaven, dancing in the sky.
title: Feather Robe from Heaven
